data.text: @JuliaRaifman never go full mask amiright, ladies & gents?

@maraomaude @JuliaRaifman A minor inconvenience? Try wearing one 12 hours a day when it is covered in slime within minutes. Your mouth and lips damp and horrible. It is gross and disgusting and very much an inconvenience.
@JuliaRaifman If I wanted to test the hypothesis "mask mandates tend to be ordered close to when COVID cases naturally peak", wouldn't I test it with a study very similar to the ones you reference?
@maraomaude @JuliaRaifman No one is saying you can't wear one. Do so with confidence if it's important to you.

@JuliaRaifman "We" labled poor workers, "essential" forcing them to feed, transport, try to heal us frequently without health insurance, sick-pay, child care, proper nurishment, PPE, overtime (or essential information!) More excess fatalities than the US Civil War before Delta! Right?

@JuliaRaifman "w/ leaders who help us coordinate & support each other..."

So, we can't do this, then. ☹️
